agent_expectation: Action should complete: Clicked Next Button

ux_insight.friction_desc: User might hesitate between different sign-up options due to similar styling
issues: Button too small - 148x40px, needs 44x44px+ for mobile
Poor elderly access - text is 12-16px, needs 16px+ for body, 20px+ for buttons
No loading state - users may click multiple times during submission
